pages.title: Free Financial Calculator Suite - EMI, SIP, Tax & Investment Tools | Numera
pages.description: Professional financial calculators for EMI, SIP, tax planning, Zakat, and investment analysis. 100% free, accurate, and easy-to-use financial planning tools.
pages.purpose: Main hub for all financial calculation needs
pages.targetAudience: Individuals, financial planners, loan seekers, investors

pages.title: EMI Calculator - Calculate Loan Installments | Home, Car, Personal Loans
pages.description: Calculate monthly EMI for home loans, car loans, and personal loans. Get detailed breakdown with principal, interest, and amortization schedule.
pages.purpose: Calculate Equated Monthly Installments for various types of loans
pages.targetAudience: Home buyers, car buyers, loan seekers

pages.title: SIP Calculator - Mutual Fund Investment Returns & Goal Planning
pages.description: Calculate SIP returns for mutual fund investments. Plan your financial goals with systematic investment planning and wealth creation strategies.
pages.purpose: Calculate returns on systematic investment plans and mutual fund investments

pages.title: Islamic Banking Calculator - Sharia Compliant Financial Tools
pages.description: Sharia-compliant financial calculations for Islamic banking products. Calculate profits and returns according to Islamic finance principles.
pages.purpose: Provide Sharia-compliant financial calculations for Islamic banking
pages.targetAudience: Muslims, Islamic banking customers, Sharia-compliant investors

pages.title: Profit Rate Calculator - Calculate Investment Returns & ROI
pages.description: Calculate profit rates, ROI, and returns on various investment instruments. Analyze profitability of financial products and investment opportunities.
pages.purpose: Calculate profit rates and returns on investments

pages.title: About Numera - Free Financial Calculator Suite
pages.description: Learn about Numera's mission to provide free, accurate financial calculators for everyone. Professional financial planning tools made accessible.
pages.purpose: Information about the platform and its mission

pages.title: Contact Numera - Support for Financial Calculators
pages.description: Contact Numera for support, feedback, or questions about our financial calculators. Get help with EMI, SIP, tax, and investment calculations.
pages.purpose: Provide contact information and support channels
pages.targetAudience: Users needing support or wanting to provide feedback

pages.title: Privacy Policy - Numera Financial Calculators
pages.description: Privacy policy for Numera financial calculators. Learn how we protect your data and ensure privacy while using our financial tools.
